verses.roman:
bhavānanda-rāyera goṣṭhī kare rāja-viṣaya
nānā-prakāre kare tārā rāja-dravya vyaya

synonyms: bhavānanda-rāyera—of Bhavānanda Rāya; goṣṭhī—the family; kare—engages; rāja-viṣaya—in government service; nānā-prakāre—in various ways; kare—do; tārā—all of them; rāja-dravya vyaya—spending the government's revenues.
translation: "All the family members of Bhavānanda Rāya are engaged in government service, but they spend the government's revenue in various ways.
